column4: Im getting Grub error 18 on boot with gutsy. i had the same partition setup with fiesty.. what gives?
theres an error when grub was written so you havta log into that parttion and edit the /boot/grub/menu.list
what is your partion name where u have the / of ubuntu ?
download slackware disc 1 and ill show u how to fix ubuntu
